exercise.text: The following are review questions from the book Let $ f = x^@p1 \; y $ and let $ g = y^@p2 \; \sin(z) $ be functions on $ {\bold E}^3 $. Express the following functions in terms of $ x,y $ and $ z $.

question.text: (b) \[ g \; \frac{ \partial f }{\partial x } + f \; \frac{ \partial g }{\partial y }\]
question.expression: partial( f , x ) * g + partial(g ,y ) f
